# The `mapped_iterator_base` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A base type of mapped iterator, that is useful for building derived iterators that do not need/want to store the map function (as in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapped-iterator">mapped&#95;iterator</a>). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A base type of mapped iterator, that is useful for building derived iterators that do not need/want to store the map function (as in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mapped-iterator">mapped&#95;iterator</a>).

These iterators must simply provide a <code>mapElement</code> method that defines how to map a value of the iterator to the provided reference type.

Definition at line 388 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">STLExtras.h</a>.
